Name: Blue Earth Inc
Description: Blue Earth, Inc. is engaged in a mergers and acquisition in the clean-tech industry. The Company primary focus is acquiring companies and technologies that serve the energy efficiency services and renewable energy market sectors. The Company's technologies include various measures designed for a specific customer or facility in its target market of small commercial businesses and residences to improve the efficiency of building systems, such as refrigeration, lighting and heating, ventilation and air conditioning. On January 19, 2011, Castrovilla Energy, Inc., a recently formed California subsidiary of the Company, acquired substantially all of the assets of Humitech of Northern California, LLC, a California limited liability company and its related company, Castrovilla, Inc. (collectively, with Humitech, the Castrovilla Acquisition) with an effective date of January 1, 2011. On September 7, 2011, it acquired Xnergy, Inc., a Carlsbad, California based energy services company.
